name: Daytona 666
description:
Fight wave after wave of demons, sent by Satan to stop your from finishing the race. As time goes on, more difficult enemies will appear, until Satan Himself comes to stop you. Don’t worry, even death won’t end your suffering, as you just reset to the beginning, to try all over again.

Made for Ludum Dare 47 in collaboration with Mr. Robespierre and R. Marmalade.
